test-case.name: available-system-properties-101
test-case.description: Tests whether available-system-properties returns a correct set (compared with all required-to-be-supported properties)

result.assert-xml: <result>Function returns value for property version: true Function returns value for property vendor: true Function returns value for property vendor-url: true Function returns value for property product-name: true Function returns value for property product-version: true Function returns value for property is-schema-aware: true Function returns value for property supports-serialization: true Function returns value for property supports-backwards-compatibility: true Function returns value for property supports-namespace-axis: true Function returns value for property supports-streaming: true Function returns value for property supports-dynamic-evaluation: true Function returns value for property xpath-version: true Function returns value for property xsd-version: true </result>
